currentlyReading.title: Island of the Blue Dolphins
currentlyReading.author: Scott O'Dell
currentlyReading.alt: Book cover of Island of the Blue Dolphins
currentlyReading.review: Few books have captivated me as much when I was a kid as this simple story of a Native girl who is left behind and has to survive on an island shaped like a dolphin. I'm revisiting it again over 35 years later and it's still beautiful, still haunting.
